text: Mba guma buni nzua vov, wom khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu buni thari khergip, Efesus ŋgu bakɨmen ki siosar ki enser ndi mbarari. Mba buni khaŋ muuŋgi, ‘Gu harathɨgi ŋkaa gu won guva haren nta suirav, gu mba harathɨgi kɨnivige, mbe gorar nta muuŋgi, mbe raar nta ndai, gu nta kɨtɨgi ga rui. Gu kha bunin ndu ndi mbai. 2.1 Kha kameŋ ne mba sios gari enser ga nzuai kameŋ ma. Ana mba siosan vhen ki gumgi gu mbigi mbui tɨvi ga nzuai kameŋ ma.
